description:
The objective of our internship program is to provide an opportunity for University students to participate in projects and/or assignments within our bank, provide Citi Ukraine with quality short term project assistance and consider internship program participants as future hires for various graduate recruitment management associate programs or other roles which may arise in the business.

 

Program timeline and structure:

  • Part time engagement of 20 hours per week is a requirement of the program.
  • The period of the program is from 3 to 5 months during the year.
  • Start date - September 16, 2013

 

Preferred skills:

  • Student at 3-5 course
  • Basic understanding of accounting and financial statements
  • Intermediate English
  • MS Office

 

Functions and responsibilities:

To support and perform department's day-to-day tasks:

  • dailybalance sheet preparation,
  • pool rates calculation and upload
  • balance sheet control procedures, etc.
name: Intern of Finance Department
